attributes.additional_details: why are we held ransom  by foriegn  countries,who sell us coal at inflated  prices?  Our  country has huge coal reserves,yet  we dont use it..why not ,thus  the price of electricty  is out of our control, when we could produce electricity using our own coal,and also create ten  of thousands of jobs..this must  not be allowed to be run by the private sector,as we have seen  what happens when they get there hands on gas, electricity, water etc..hang you head in shame mrs thatcher
